user.name: Phillip Medina
user.animeTitle: Here are some things that I know.
user.flickrContent: A little more about me... I enjoy automotive tuning and photography. I've owned a few modified cars and currently have a nicely modified Subaru WRX STi. Below are pictures of cars that I like on Flickr. If this is not your taste, you can use the search field below to pull a different set of pictures using flickrs api.
